log_in_as_description: By entering as a club you will have the opportunity to enter the services and activities carried out by your club, you will also have some statistics on your work, instead by entering as a guest you will be able to search and see the services and activities carried out by each Italian club.
this_app_was_developed_by: This app was developed by Leo MD 108's Information Technology Team
description_search_for_guest:
By virtue of the transparency that we have adopted, here you will be able to see all the services and activities carried out by each Italian leo club in complete freedom!
You can search for any parameter you want!
title: title
connection_error: Oops... There is a network error, now I fix it!
info_home:
On this page you will find the summary of your club with the counts of the services and activities carried out and by clicking on the appropriate buttons you will reach a page where there will be all the services and activities carried out with the possibility of adding new ones!

Clicking on the counts you will find below you can vary the number of members and aspirants present!

Instead by going to search you will reach the search page to see what other clubs are doing or look for something specific made by yours!

👋🏽
info_add_service:
Here you can enter the services performed by your club, enter all the requested information, if they are not quantifiable you can leave them blank.
The required fields are:

title
date
description
city
satisfaction degree
area
type

Happy insertion! 😁
info_add_activity:
Here you can enter the activities carried out by your club, all fields are required!

Happy insertion! 😁
info_search:
On this page, you can search for services and activities carried out by any club. By pressing the button with the magnifying glass you will start the search, instead by clicking on the '+' button you will access the advanced search panel where you can filter the services and/or activities as you wish!

Happy searching!âœŒ🏽
if_other_in_description: If 'Other' specify it in the description
user_or_password_wrong: The email or the password are wrong!
hub_description: The new PortaLeo is the center that contains all the services offered by the Leo 108 multidistrict for members and/or clubs!
info_edit_activity:
Here you can edit the selected activity!

Happy editing! 😁
info_edit_service:
Here you can edit the selected service!

Happy editing! 😁
message_error_service_already_exists:
This service already exists!
Remember there cannot be 2 services with the same title and same date!
message_error_activity_already_exists:
This activity already exists!
Remember there cannot be 2 activities with the same title and same date!
message_error_unable_to_add_for_someone_: If you get this error you are blowing everything!
message_error_unable_to_edit_for_someone: If you get this error you are blowing everything!
message_error_unable_to_delete_for_someo: If you get this error you are blowing everything!
are_you_sure_delete_service: Are you sure you want to remove this service?
are_you_sure_delete_activity: Are you sure you want to remove this activity?
